participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about fashion, with a love for style and design.
participant_1.background: My desire is to become a fashion designer. Since young I have loved fashion. My inspirations are Alexander McQueen and Coco Chanel. I love to go shopping and inspire myself in stylish stores. I moved to NY to study in a prestigious designing school.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, with a strong affinity for video games and music.
participant_2.background: I was diagnosed with autism. People in school said I was quiet. I have not done anything since high school. I play games at the arcade, still. I listen to Linkin Park; I do not know why.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play games at the arcade.
That's cool! I used to play a lot of video games when I was younger.
I still play a lot of video games.
What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play action games, like Call of Duty and Halo.
Those are both great games! I used to play them all the time.
I also like to play racing games, like Forza Horizon and Need for Speed.
Those are great games too! I love racing games.
I also like to play fighting games, like Mortal Kombat and Tekken.
Those are great games too! I love fighting games.
I also like to play sports games, like FIFA and Madden.
Those are great games too! I love sports games.
I also like to play puzzle games, like Tetris and Bejeweled.
Those are great games too! I love puzzle games.
I also like to play adventure games, like Uncharted and Tomb Raider.
Those are great games too! I love adventure games.
I also like to play role-playing games, like Skyrim and The Witcher.
Those are great games too! I love role-playing games.
